text: Kelemane bhai khan, ki lukaikene ase, etu apuni khan najanikena thakibo dibo mon nai, kele koile apnikhan nijor bhabona te nijor to gyaani nisena nabhabibo le. Etu lukai kene thaka to Porjati khan kiman basi kene ase, taikhan purah nohua tak, olop somoi nimite Israel manu mon tan hoi jabole dise.
